title: 【轉知】姊妹校泗水大學辦理全英線上課程"ChatGPT, Artificial Intelligence & Metaverse for Our Daily Life"，歡迎報名參加。
department: 國際事務處國際合作組
author: 陳良愛
content:
分類： 活動公告, 課程公告
來源： 國際事務處國際合作組 - 陳良愛 - ice@gms.ndhu.edu.tw - 電話5107
對象： 全校學生
標題： 【轉知】姊妹校泗水大學辦理全英線上課程"ChatGPT, Artificial Intelligence & Metaverse for Our Daily Life"，歡迎報名參加。
日期： Tue, 3 Oct 2023 10:15:02 +0800
附檔： Statement Letter Summer Program 2023.pdf (112 KB)   Poster Summer Program Nov 23.png (3 MB)   
Before 2023 comes to the end, Ubaya is gladly welcome your students to our online summer program  which discussing important issue of the year entitled
 
"ChatGPT, Artificial Intelligence & Metaverse for Our Daily Life” 
 
on November 27 - December 01, 2023.
 
Participants will learn how to utilize AI, ChatGPT, and Metaverse which are massively used nowadays. The program will combine academic webinar classes and practical classes with non-academic Indonesian language and virtual tours.  
 
Program features:
1. E-certificate;
2. Webinar classes;
3. Various virtual tours;
4. Indonesian culture class.
5. Meet with students around the world 
 
The program will be conducted fully in English via ZOOM application.
Please be the first to register for the program as the quota is limited. The registration deadline will be on Friday, November 03, 2023.
 
To register, please complete the registration form on https://ubaya.id/spnov23 or scan the QR code on the poster and fill out the statement letter attached to be uploaded on the form. 
For further information, do not hesitate to contact Ms. Fensi or Ms. Sandra on: international+student@unit.ubaya.ac.id.
